original: Majjhima Nikāya 16
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cetokhilasutta
analyzed: cetokhilasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañca cetokhilā appahīnā, pañca cetasovinibandhā
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno pañca cetasokhilāḥ appahīnāḥ pañca cetasovinibandhāḥ

original: asamucchinnā, so vatimasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: asamucchinnā saḥ vatimasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Katamāssa pañca cetokhilā appahīnā honti?
analyzed: katamāssa pañca cetokhilāḥ appahīnāḥ honti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati na adhimuccati na sampasīdati

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati na adhimuccati na sampasīdati tassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ paṭhamo cetokhilo appahīno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam paṭhamaḥ cetaḥ khilo appahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu dhamme kaṅkhati vicikicchati na adhimuccati na sampasīdati pe

original: evamassāyaṁ dutiyo cetokhilo appahīno hoti.
analyzed: evam assa ayam dutiyaḥ cetaḥ khilo appahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghe kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu saṅghe kaṅkhati vicikicchati na adhimuccati na sampasīdati pe

original: evamassāyaṁ tatiyo cetokhilo appahīno hoti.
analyzed: evam assa ayam tatiyaḥ cetaḥ khilo appahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhāya kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu sikkhāya kaṅkhati vicikicchati na adhimuccati na sampasīdati

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhāya kaṅkhati vicikicchati nādhimuccati na sampasīdati, tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu sikkhāya kaṅkhati vicikicchati na adhimuccati na sampasīdati tassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ catuttho cetokhilo appahīno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam catuttho cetaḥ khilo appahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupitaḥ hoti anatta manaḥ āhata cittaḥ khila jātaḥ

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto, tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu kupitaḥ hoti anatta manaḥ āhata citto khila jāto tassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ pañcamo cetokhilo appahīno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam pañcamaḥ cetaḥ khilo appahīnaḥ hoti

original: Imāssa pañca cetokhilā appahīnā honti.
analyzed: imāssa pañca cetokhilā appahīnā honti

original: Katamāssa pañca cetasovinibandhā asamucchinnā honti?
analyzed: katamāḥ sa pañca cetasaḥ vinibandhāḥ asamucchinnāḥ honti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāme avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāme avīta rāgaḥ hoti avigata chandaḥ avigata pemaḥ avigata pipāsaḥ avigata pariḷāhaḥ avigata taṇhaḥ

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāme avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho, tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu kāme a vīta rāgaḥ hoti avigata chandaḥ avigata pemaḥ avigata pipāsaḥ avigata pariḷāhaḥ avigata taṇhaḥ tassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ paṭhamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam paṭhamaḥ cetasovinibandho asamucchinnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye avītarāgo hoti …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye a vīta rāgaḥ hoti pe

original: evamassāyaṁ dutiyo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: evam assa ayam dutiyaḥ cetasaḥ vinibandhaḥ asamucchinnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu rūpe avītarāgo hoti …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu rūpe a vīta rāgaḥ hoti pe

original: evamassāyaṁ tatiyo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: evam assa ayam tatiyaḥ cetasaḥ vinibandhaḥ asamucchinnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu yāvadattham udarāvadehakam bhuñjitvā seyya sukham passa sukham middha sukham anuyuttaḥ viharati

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu yāvadattham udarāvadehakam bhuñjitvā

original: middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati, tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: middha sukham anuyuttaḥ viharati tassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ catuttho cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam catuttho cetasovinibandho asamucchinnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ carati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram devanikāyam paṇidhāya brahmacariyam carati

original: ‘imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
analyzed: iminā aham sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devaḥ vā bhavissāmi devaññataraḥ vā ati

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ carati: ‘imināhaṁ
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu aññataram devanikāyam paṇidhāya brahmacariyam carati iminā āha

original: sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti,
analyzed: sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devaḥ vā bhavissāmi devaññataraḥ vā ati

original: tassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: tassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ pañcamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam na namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam pañcamo cetasovinibandho asamucchinnaḥ hoti

original: Imāssa pañca cetasovinibandhā asamucchinnā honti.
analyzed: pañca cetasaḥ vinibandhāḥ asamucchinnāḥ honti

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime pañca cetokhilā appahīnā, ime pañca cetasovinibandhā
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ ime pañca cetaḥ khilāḥ a pahīnāḥ ime pañca cetaso vinibandhā

original: asamucchinnā, so vatimasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: asamucchinnā saḥ vatimasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti na etam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pañca cetokhilā pahīnā, pañca cetasovinibandhā
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhuno pañca cetaḥ khilā pahīnā pañca cetaso vinibandhā

original: susamucchinnā, so vatimasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: su samucchinnā saḥ vatimasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Katamāssa pañca cetokhilā pahīnā honti?
analyzed: pañca pahīnāḥ honti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu satthari na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati, tassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu satthari na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati tassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ paṭhamo cetokhilo pahīno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam paṭhamaḥ cetaḥ khilo pahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu dhamme na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati pe

original: evamassāyaṁ dutiyo cetokhilo pahīno hoti.
analyzed: evam assa ayam dutiyaḥ cetaḥ khilaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅghe na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu saṅghe na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati pe

original: evamassāyaṁ tatiyo cetokhilo pahīno hoti.
analyzed: evam assa ayam tatiyaḥ cetaḥ khilaḥ pahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sikkhāya na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu sikkhāya na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati adhimuccati sampasīdati pe

original: evamassāyaṁ catuttho cetokhilo pahīno hoti.
analyzed: evam assa ayam catutthaḥ cetaḥ khilo pahīnaḥ hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu na kupito hoti na anattamano anāhatacitto akhilajāto.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu na kupitaḥ hoti na anatta manaḥ anāhata cittaḥ akhila jātaḥ

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu na kupito hoti na anattamano anāhatacitto akhilajāto, tassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu sabrahmacārīsu na kupitaḥ hoti na anatta manaḥ anāhata cittaḥ akhila jātaḥ tassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ pañcamo cetokhilo pahīno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam pañcamaḥ cetaḥ khilo pahīnaḥ hoti

original: Imāssa pañca cetokhilā pahīnā honti.
analyzed: pañca cetaḥ khilā pahīnāḥ honti

original: Katamāssa pañca cetasovinibandhā susamucchinnā honti?
analyzed: pañca cetasaḥ vinibandhā su samucchinnāḥ honti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāme vītarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāme vīta rāgaḥ hoti vigata chandaḥ vigata pemaḥ vigata pipāsaḥ vigata pariḷāhaḥ vigata taṇhaḥ

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāme vītarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho, tassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu kāme vīta rāgaḥ hoti vigata chandaḥ vigata pemaḥ vigata pipāsaḥ vigata pariḷāhaḥ vigata taṇhaḥ tassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ paṭhamo cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam paṭhamaḥ cetasovinibandho su samucchinno hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye vītarāgo hoti …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu kāye vīta rāgaḥ hoti pe

original: rūpe vītarāgo hoti …pe…
analyzed: rūpe vīta rāgaḥ hoti pe

original: na yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati.
analyzed: na yāvadattham udara avadehakam bhuñjitvā seyya sukham passa sukham middha sukham anuyuttaḥ viharati

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na yāvadatthaṁ udarāvadehakaṁ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu na yāvadattham udarāvadehakam bhuñjitvā

original: middhasukhaṁ anuyutto viharati, tassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: middha sukham anuyuttaḥ viharati tassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ catuttho cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam catuttho cetasovinibandho su samucchinno hoti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu na aññataram devanikāyam paṇidhāya

original: carati: ‘imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti.
analyzed: carati iminā aham sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devaḥ vā bhavissāmi devaññataraḥ vā ati

original: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṁ carati:
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ bhikkhave bhikkhu na aññataram devanikāyam paṇidhāya brahmacariyam carati

original: ‘imināhaṁ sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro
analyzed: iminā aham sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena vā devaḥ vā bhavissāmi devaññataraḥ

original: vā’ti, tassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya.
analyzed: vāti tassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya

original: Yassa cittaṁ namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya, evamassāyaṁ pañcamo cetasovinibandho susamucchinno hoti.
analyzed: yassa cittam namati ātappāya anuyogāya sātaccāya padhānāya evam assa ayam pañcamaḥ cetasovinibandho su samucchinno hoti

original: Imāssa pañca cetasovinibandhā susamucchinnā honti.
analyzed: pañca su samucchinnāḥ honti

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ime pañca cetokhilā pahīnā, ime pañca cetasovinibandhā
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ ime pañca cetaḥ khilā pahīnāḥ ime pañca cetasaḥ vinibandhā

original: susamucchinnā, so vatimasmiṁ dhammavinaye vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: su samucchinnā saḥ vatimasmin dhamma vinaye vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: So chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti,
analyzed: saḥ chanda samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāva iti

original: vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti,
analyzed: vīriya samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāva iti

original: cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti,
analyzed: citta samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāva iti

original: vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti, ussoḷhīyeva pañcamī.
analyzed: vīmasā samādhi padhāna saṅkhāra samannāgatam iddhipādam bhāva iti ussoḍhīya iva pañcamī

original: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, evaṁ ussoḷhipannarasaṅgasamannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidāya, bhabbo sambodhāya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
analyzed: sa kho saḥ bhikkhave evam ussoḷhi pannarasaṅga samannāgataḥ bhikkhu bhabbaḥ abhinibbidāya bhabbaḥ sambodhāya bhabbaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave kukkuṭiyāḥ aṇḍāni aṭṭha vā dasa vā dvādasa vā

original: Tānassu kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitāni sammā pariseditāni sammā paribhāvitāni.
analyzed: kukkuṭiyā sammā adhisayitāni sammā pariseditāni sammā paribhāvitāni

original: Kiñcāpi tassā kukkuṭiyā na evaṁ icchā uppajjeyya:
analyzed: kiñca api tassā kukkuṭiyā na evam icchā uppajjeyya

original: ‘aho vatime kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyyun’ti.
analyzed: aho vati me kukkuṭa potakā pāda nakha sikhāya vā mukha tuṇḍakena vā aṇḍa kosam padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjeyyunti

original: Atha kho bhabbāva te kukkuṭapotakā pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṁ padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjituṁ.
analyzed: atha kho bhabbāva te kukkuṭa potakā pāda nakha sikhāya vā mukha tuṇḍakena vā aṇḍa kosam padāletvā sotthinā abhinibbhijjitu

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, evaṁ ussoḷhipannarasaṅgasamannāgato bhikkhu bhabbo abhinibbidāya, bhabbo sambodhāya, bhabbo anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāyā”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave evam ussoḷhi pannarasaṅga samannāgataḥ bhikkhu bhabbaḥ abhinibbidāya bhabbaḥ sambodhāya bhabbaḥ anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Cetokhilasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: cetokhila suttam niṭṭhitam chaṭṭha
